Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.user_interface.cli

Class MiniBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.client.user_interface.cli.MiniBox
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeneralInfoBox, KillShotTrackBox, LayoutBox, MyInfoBox, MyPowerUpBox, MyWeaponBox, PlayerBox, SelectablesBox, WeaponsInLayoutBox
    public class MiniBox
extends java.lang.Object
    Is the elementary component of a window, a rectangular matrix of Strings

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected int height
      the height of this box
      protected java.lang.String[][] stringBox
      the array of Strings (escape color - char - escape color) with the visual content of the box
      protected int width
      the width of this box
      protected int x
      the x position int the window (from the left side)
      protected int y
      the y position in the window (from the top)

        public void update​(MatchView match)
        Automatically updates its content. in this 'basic' MiniBox it is empty since has only static content
        Parameters:
        match - the match from which retrieve information

        str - the text to insert
        x - the x position of text from the left side of this MiniBox

        color - the desired color of the text to insert

      • insertTextMultiline

        public int insertTextMultiline​(java.lang.String text,
                               int x,
                               int y,
                               int width)
        Insertes multiline text on this MiniBox
        Parameters:
        text - the text to insert
        x - the x position of the text, from the left side of this MiniBox
        y - the y position of sub-box from the top of this MiniBox
        width - the width of the multiline text
        Returns:
        the number of resulting line of the text inserted
